ThingDef.label: Tallarn desert goggles
ThingDef.description: Goggles unique to the Tallarn Desert Raiders. Provides much-needed protection for the eyes against sand - useful when operating under cover of a sandstorm. \n\nThe Guardsmen of Tallarn suffered greatly in the Warp disaster, with their Sentinel walkers ending up as little more than Chaos-tainted scrap metal. Nonetheless, they have transitioned fairly well into light infantry, and the deserts are mostly the same whatever planet they are on.

ThingDef.label: Tallarn goggled headwrap
ThingDef.description: A combination of a headwrap and goggles, perfect for fast-paced desert warfare. \n\nRecently, some Guardsmen of Tallarn have requested deployment not in the deserts, but in the forests of the rimworld. Much speculation has been made about this phenomenon - the leading theory is that it gives the Desert Raiders a glimpse into what Tallarn once was, before war had razed their whole planet into a wasteland.

ThingDef.label: Tallarn officer headwrap
ThingDef.description: A headwrap and goggles combination, distinctly colored to show that the wearer is a Tallarnian officer. \n\nOn the planet of Tallarn, the people live in many tribes, each with their own alliances and enemies. A society of honor, vendettas are a grave matter and even the smallest slight must be avenged in equal measures.

ThingDef.label: Tallarn headwrap
ThingDef.description: A headwrap, or “shemagh”, worn by the Tallarn Desert Raiders. It provides no protection against enemy fire, but it is good to wear in hot weather, and the Desert Raiders prefer not to be shot in the first place. \n\nAfter the desolation of Tallarn, the planet could provide the Imperium nothing but manpower. The population lives both above and below ground, keeping in touch with the endless desert.
